modName: Realistic Room Rental Enhanced and No Snow Under the Roof Compatibility Patch
summary: Compatibility for Realistic Room Rental and No Snow Under the Roof.  Fixes issues outside of the Nightgate Inn.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small compatibility patch I put together to fix some issues outside of the Nightgate Inn. The edits are fairly small... I just replaced a few meshes with the snow-covered versions and disabled a few snowdrifts that were in the way.

Note: This patch is only for Realistic Room Rental Enhanced. The Basic version should not require any patch to be compatible.

In your load order, No Snow Under the Roof should come first, then Realistic Room Rental, then this patch.

Both of the original mods are required. All credit should go to the original authors:
perseid9 - Realistic Room Rental Enhanced (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25029/?)
PROMETHEUS_ts - No Snow Under the Roof (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51188/?)

I made this patch for my own use, but I see other people asking for it, so here it is. I am hoping that eventually perseid9 will bundle a NSUtR patch with Realistic Room Rentals. I do not have any plans at this time to do any additional work with this patch, but if you see a problem, let me know and I may fix it.
author: noobzor
